text: Glorat is a place and estate in the parish of Campsie in East Dunbartonshire, Scotland. ==History== A towerhouse was built at Glorat in the 16th century and Glorat House was built in the 17th century by Mungo Stirling. Evidence of a mill and coal mining exist in the area. ==References== Category:East Dunbartonshire Category:West of Scotland geography stubs
title: Glorat
